Header.Original: CVE-2009-XXXX [sysvinit: no-root option in expert installer exposes locally exploitable security flaw]
Header.Description: [sysvinit: no-root option in expert installer exposes locally exploitable security flaw]

Annotations.Original: NOTE: hardly a security issue, if an attacker has local access to the machine and you

Annotations.Original: NOTE: don't use encryption or something similar you have lost anyway

Annotations.Original: NOTE: - this ^ philosophy is flawed; it should not be trivial to get root just because you
